definition[0]: a person or company that is paid to take packages somewhere
definition[2]: to send something somewhere using a courier
definition[3]: a person or company whose job is to collect packages, documents etc and deliver them somewhere
example[1]: Harrods had sent the garment by courier.
definition[4]: someone who is employed by a travel company to help people when they are on holiday, for example to give them information or organize trips to interesting places
example[2]: a courier for a touring holiday company
